desc: For the most delicious foods fresh of the grill or used as a seasoning mix in soups, stews, dips, salad dressing, crab boil, blood Mary mix and much more, Awesome on steaks, chicken , fish or pork. Perfect to add some zip to your grill vegetables. One taste and you'll be hooked!

layout.text: Big Bad John's Lipsmackin' Spice Rub

You'll never have to eat boring food again!!!
No Calories
No MSG
No Fat
No Sugar
Gluten Free
Lower in Salt
